item.title: Attitudes of employees towards mental health in the tech workplace
item.description: Understanding and accepting mental health as an issue at the workplace has become ever so crucial in recent times. Mental illnesses like depression and anxiety can have a significant economic impact; the estimated cost to the global economy is US$ 1 trillion per year in lost productivity (source). Open Sourcing Mental Illness (OSMI) is a non profit organization that focuses on raising awareness, education and providing resources to support mental wellness at workplaces, especially in the tech industry.
